description: Dashboard for remote monitoring AXPERT Inverters

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
unix_timestamp(created) AS "time",
  (var9) voltage
FROM QPIGS
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
ORDER BY created

SELECT 
unix_timestamp(created) AS "time",
  (var10*var9) charging
FROM QPIGS
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
ORDER BY created

SELECT
  unix_timestamp(created) AS "time",
  (var16*var9*(-1)) discharging
FROM QPIGS
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
ORDER BY created

SELECT
  created AS "time",
  var9
FROM QPIGS
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
ORDER BY created

SELECT
  created AS "time",
  var6 + 60
FROM QPIGS
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
ORDER BY created

  created AS "time",
  var4
FROM BMS
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
ORDER BY created

  created AS "time",

FROM QPIGS
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
ORDER BY created
